articleList.title: 1Trump's Twitter wars offer a surreal glimpse into a President's mind as stark 100,000 deaths landmark looms
articleList.desc: 4(CNN)Sometime in the next few days, the 100,000th American will succumb to Covid-19 in a pandemic that President Donald Trump once predicted would just miraculously disappear.
